docs.snippet: Champions League runners-up Borussia Dortmund were made to sweat by fourth-tier Wilhelmshaven on Saturday before scoring three goals in the last 19 minutes to win 3-0 and reach the German Cup second round...

docs.snippet: Rainbow flags are flying from scores of Amsterdam buildings as tens of thousands of festival-goers, many dressed in pink or wearing studded leather, party it up at one of the city's biggest events: the annual Gay Pride celebration....

headline.main: Amsterdam Floods Pink for Gay Pride Festival

docs.snippet: During Nelson Mandela’s hospitalization, Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, his former wife, has made an ostentatious re-entry into the public arena....
docs.lead_paragraph: During Nelson Mandela’s hospitalization, Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, his former wife, has made an ostentatious re-entry into the public arena.
docs.abstract: Saturday Profile of Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, ex-wife of former South African Pres Nelson Mandela; before her fall from grace, Madikizela-Mandela was one of the key public figures in the country's long struggle for nonracial democracy; during Nelson Mandela's hospitalization, she is ostentatiously trying to re-enter the public arena and emphasize her claim to part of the Mandela legacy.

headline.main: In Mandela Legacy, a Place for Winnie?
headline.print_headline: In Mandela Legacy, a Place for Winnie?

docs.snippet: The New York Times Co has agreed to sell The Boston Globe to the principal owner of the Boston Red Sox baseball team for $70 million in cash, a small fraction of what the Times paid for the newspaper 20 years ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: The New York Times Co has agreed to sell The Boston Globe to the principal owner of the Boston Red Sox baseball team for $70 million in cash, a small fraction of what the Times paid for the newspaper 20 years ago.

headline.main: New York Times Sells Boston Globe to Red Sox Owner
headline.print_headline: New York Times Sells Boston Globe to Red Sox Owner

docs.snippet: As recently as five years ago, billionaire John Henry, could do no wrong in Boston, but since then the image of the man who agreed to buy the Boston Globe on Saturday has taken a beating....

headline.main: From Boston Hero to Goat, Billionaire John Henry Takes on Globe Challenge
